Structs/PKStatus.html#/tintColor.name: tintColor
Structs/PKStatus.html#/tintColor.abstract: Tint color of PKStatus if any. This reflects the color of a given Apple Reminder list if any.

Structs/PKStatus.html#/completed.name: completed
Structs/PKStatus.html#/completed.abstract: Reflects how many points the user already achieved.

Structs/PKStatus.html#/timeRangeLowerBou.name: timeRangeLowerBound
Structs/PKStatus.html#/timeRangeLowerBou.abstract: The start date of the user defined PKReport.timeRange

Structs/PKStatus.html#/timeRangeUpperBou.name: timeRangeUpperBound
Structs/PKStatus.html#/timeRangeUpperBou.abstract: The end date of the user defined PKReport.timeRange

Structs/PKStatus.html#/isDone.name: isDone
Structs/PKStatus.html#/isDone.abstract: Flag whether the user already achieved their goal.

Structs/PKReport.html#/displayStyle.name: displayStyle
Structs/PKReport.html#/displayStyle.abstract: Defines how the PKReport should be rendered. Either a bar which shows the current progres, or a bar which shows the remaining amount of work.

Structs/PKReport.html#/listIdentifier.name: listIdentifier
Structs/PKReport.html#/listIdentifier.abstract: Unique identifier of an Apple Reminder list. See EKCalendar.calendarIdentifier.

Structs/PKReport.html#/searchTerm.name: searchTerm
Structs/PKReport.html#/searchTerm.abstract: A search term which should be used to match Apple Reminders against this PKReport. IMPORTANT: The text needs to be part of the reminders title.

Structs/PKReport.html#/isPriorityBased.name: isPriorityBased
Structs/PKReport.html#/isPriorityBased.abstract: Whether or not to calculate the progress of this PKReport based upon Apple Reminder priorities.

Structs/PKReport.html#/timeRange.name: timeRange
Structs/PKReport.html#/timeRange.abstract: The time range in which the desired goal should be achieved. If nil the overall time range is used.

Structs/PKReport.html#/goal.name: goal
Structs/PKReport.html#/goal.abstract: The desired goal, the user wants to achieve. If nil the desired goal is to complete all matched Apple Reminders.

Structs/PKReport.html#/showInTodayScreen.name: showInTodayScreen
Structs/PKReport.html#/showInTodayScreen.abstract: If this PKReport should be rendered in the Today Screen Widget.

Structs/PKReport.html#/notificationsEnab.name: notificationsEnabled
Structs/PKReport.html#/notificationsEnab.abstract: Whether or not the user wants to receive notifications regarding this report.

Structs/PKReport.html.name: PKReport
Structs/PKReport.html.abstract: A user defined report which is the heart of any progress calculation.

Structs/PKStatus.html.name: PKStatus
Structs/PKStatus.html.abstract: Provides an evaluated progress status of a given report.

Protocols/PKNotificationHandler.html#/ad.name: addObserver(for:queue:using:)
Protocols/PKNotificationHandler.html#/ad.abstract: Adds an observer for all given PKNotifications and returns a PKNotification.Token.

Protocols/PKNotificationHandler.html.name: PKNotificationHandler
Protocols/PKNotificationHandler.html.abstract: Generic protocol which adds basic NotificationHandler capabilities to its conforming objects.

Protocols/ProgressCollectionViewControll.name: ProgressCollectionViewControllerDataSource
Protocols/ProgressCollectionViewControll.abstract: DataSource protocol for ProgressCollectionViewController which is capable of loading, reloading and saving PKReport objects.

Protocols/ProgressCollectionViewControll.name: ProgressCollectionViewControllerDelegate
Protocols/ProgressCollectionViewControll.abstract: Delegate protocol for ProgressCollectionViewController to allow for event customization based upon user interaction.

Extensions/Calendar.html#/string(from:).name: string(from:)
Extensions/Calendar.html#/string(from:).abstract: Translates a given PKTimeRange in a human readable format.

Enums/PKTimeRange.html#/availableTimeRan.name: availableTimeRanges
Enums/PKTimeRange.html#/availableTimeRan.abstract: Iterable object providing all available time ranges.

Enums/PKTimeRange.html#/lowerBound(in:).name: lowerBound(in:)
Enums/PKTimeRange.html#/lowerBound(in:).abstract: Effective start date in a given calendar of the chosen item.

Enums/PKTimeRange.html#/upperBound(in:).name: upperBound(in:)
Enums/PKTimeRange.html#/upperBound(in:).abstract: Effective end date in a given calendar of the chosen item.

Enums/PKNotification.html#/reportStoreDi.name: reportStoreDidChange
Enums/PKNotification.html#/reportStoreDi.abstract: Subscribe to if you want to be notified when the PKReportStore has changed.

Enums/PKNotification.html#/reminderStore.name: reminderStoreDidChange
Enums/PKNotification.html#/reminderStore.abstract: Subscribe to if you want to be notified when the PKReminderStore has changed.

Enums/PKNotification.html#/Token.name: Token
Enums/PKNotification.html#/Token.abstract: Helper class for observing notifications. Allows for deregistration upon deallocation.

Enums/PKLayoutStyle.html#/table.name: table
Enums/PKLayoutStyle.html#/table.abstract: Layout reports as regular table view. Used on small screens.

Enums/PKLayoutStyle.html#/grid.name: grid
Enums/PKLayoutStyle.html#/grid.abstract: Layout reports as grid view. Used on medium to big screens.

Enums/PKDisplayStyle.html.name: PKDisplayStyle
Enums/PKDisplayStyle.html.abstract: Style in which to render the progress bar.

Enums/PKLayoutStyle.html.name: PKLayoutStyle
Enums/PKLayoutStyle.html.abstract: Defines how the reports should be laid out.

Enums/PKTimeRange.html.name: PKTimeRange
Enums/PKTimeRange.html.abstract: Codable time range which is capable of determining lower and upper bounds (start and end dates) of its items.

Classes/Progress.html#/reportStore.name: reportStore
Classes/Progress.html#/reportStore.abstract: The shared report manager which provides access to report CRUD operations.

Classes/Progress.html#/reminderStore.name: reminderStore
Classes/Progress.html#/reminderStore.abstract: The shared reminder manager which provides access to Apple Reminders.

Classes/Progress.html#/notifier.name: notifier
Classes/Progress.html#/notifier.abstract: The shared notifier manager which handles user notification handling.

Classes/Progress.html#/configure(suiteNa.name: configure(suiteName:userNotificationCenter:giphyApiKey:)
Classes/Progress.html#/configure(suiteNa.abstract: Configuration method which initializes the ProgressKit framework for usage in your own app.

Classes/PKReportStore.html#/standard.name: standard
Classes/PKReportStore.html#/standard.abstract: Shared instance of PKReportStore. You’ll most probably want to use this one in your code.

Classes/PKReportStore.html#/save(report:.name: save(report:)
Classes/PKReportStore.html#/save(report:.abstract: Saves a given report to persistent storage.

Classes/PKReportStore.html#/save(all:).name: save(all:)
Classes/PKReportStore.html#/save(all:).abstract: Saves all given reports to persistent storage.

Classes/PKReportStore.html#/delete(repor.name: delete(report:)
Classes/PKReportStore.html#/delete(repor.abstract: Deletes the given report from the persistent storage.

Classes/PKReportStore.html#/loadReports(.name: loadReports(withDisplayStyle:)
Classes/PKReportStore.html#/loadReports(.abstract: Loads all reports with a given display style from persistent storage.

Classes/PKReportStore.html#/loadReports(.name: loadReports(groupedByTimeRangWithDisplayStyle:filteredBy:)
Classes/PKReportStore.html#/loadReports(.abstract: Loads all reports groupbed by display style and filtered by callback function.

Classes/PKReminderStore.html#/standard.name: standard
Classes/PKReminderStore.html#/standard.abstract: Shared instance of PKReminderStore. You’ll most probably want to use this instead of creating your own instance.

Classes/PKReminderStore.html#/allLists(c.name: allLists(completionHandler:)
Classes/PKReminderStore.html#/allLists(c.abstract: Retrieves all Apple Reminder Lists as EKCalendar objects.

Classes/PKReminderStore.html#/verifyAuth.name: verifyAuthorization(completionHandler:)
Classes/PKReminderStore.html#/verifyAuth.abstract: Verifies user authorization for access to the EKEventStore.

Classes/PKReminderStore.html#/fetchStatu.name: fetchStatus(for:in:completionHandler:)
Classes/PKReminderStore.html#/fetchStatu.abstract: Fetches the progress status for a given PKReport using a provided Calendar.

Classes/PKNotifier.html#/standard.name: standard
Classes/PKNotifier.html#/standard.abstract: Shared instance of PKNotifier. You’ll most probably want to use this except you know otherwise.

Classes/PKNotifier.html#/requestAuthoriz.name: requestAuthorization(completionHandler:)
Classes/PKNotifier.html#/requestAuthoriz.abstract: Request user authorization in order to be able to send notifications. Uses the userNotificationCenter from Progress.configure(...).

Classes/PKNotifier.html#/authorizationSt.name: authorizationStatus(completionHandler:)
Classes/PKNotifier.html#/authorizationSt.abstract: Retrieve the authorizationStatus using the userNotificationCenter from Progress.configure(...).

Classes/PKNotifier.html#/sendUserNotific.name: sendUserNotificationsWhereNeeded(reportStore:reminderStore:completionHandler:)
Classes/PKNotifier.html#/sendUserNotific.abstract: Sends all due userNotifications. For this, all reports stored in PKReportStore are evaluated against the reminders stored in PKReminderStore. You most probably want to call this from a background thread in your app.

Classes/PKNotifier.html#/sendUserNotific.name: sendUserNotificationIfNeeded(for:of:completionHandler:)
Classes/PKNotifier.html#/sendUserNotific.abstract: Send due userNotifications for a given report which is evaluated against the reminders stored in PKReminderStore. This function is called by PKNotifier.sendUserNotificationsWhereNeeded(...).

Classes/PKMessageStore.html#/standard.name: standard
Classes/PKMessageStore.html#/standard.abstract: Shared instance of the PKMessageStore. You’ll most probably want to use this instead of your own one.

Classes/PKMessageStore.html.name: PKMessageStore
Classes/PKMessageStore.html.abstract: Provider for predefined text messages based upon the current progress of a user (PKUserNotificationType).

Classes/PKNotifier.html.name: PKNotifier
Classes/PKNotifier.html.abstract: PKNotifier provides a user notification interface and is capable to decide whether or not ProgressKit should inform the user about its progress.

Classes/PKReminderStore.html.name: PKReminderStore
Classes/PKReminderStore.html.abstract: Convenience interface for interacting with Apples EventKit framework.

Classes/PKReportStore.html.name: PKReportStore
Classes/PKReportStore.html.abstract: Convenience interface which provides CRUD operations for PKReports.

Classes/Progress.html.name: Progress
Classes/Progress.html.abstract: Progress is a convenient interface for reminders & reports and it’s the primary means of interacting with them.

Classes/ProgressCollectionCell.html.name: ProgressCollectionCell
Classes/ProgressCollectionCell.html.abstract: A UICollectionViewCell which is capable of drawing a progress bar based upon PKStatus and PKReport.

Classes/ProgressCollectionSectionHeader..name: ProgressCollectionSectionHeader
Classes/ProgressCollectionSectionHeader..abstract: A UICollectionReusableView used as section header which displays the human readable format of PKTimeRange if needed.

Classes/ProgressCollectionViewController.name: ProgressCollectionViewController
Classes/ProgressCollectionViewController.abstract: The heart of progress rendering is a UICollectionViewController which reads, evaluates and renders the PKReports from the configured ProgressCollectionViewControllerDataSource.

Classes/WatermarkAnimatedImageView.html.name: WatermarkAnimatedImageView
Classes/WatermarkAnimatedImageView.html.abstract: Used by the notification extension to render the watermark above a GIPHY image.
